analysis.key_quote: If swaths of experts (yes, those dreaded "bureaucrats" of whom the media speaks) are reclassified as political appointees, then we are likely to see those experts replaced with political appointees who will tell elected officials what they want to hear.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the politicization of civil service and the potential loss of expertise, which aligns with the themes of protecting merit-based systems and due process rights.
